gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
gunslinger.desc: A seasoned independent operator, preferring the open void to planetary garrisons. Known for their quick draw and resourceful combat style.

sef_trooper.name: SEF Trooper
sef_trooper.desc: The ubiquitous backbone of the Space Expeditionary Forces. Troopers are reliable, adaptable, and form the core of any SEF expeditionary squad.

sef_squadleader.name: SEF Squad Leader
sef_squadleader.desc: A Non-Commissioned Officer (NCO) with extensive combat experience. Squad Leaders are equipped to lead from the front, inspiring their team and engaging threats directly.

sef_marksman.name: SEF Marksman
sef_marksman.desc: A specialist trained in precision long-range engagements. Marksmen provide critical suppressing fire and eliminate high-value targets from afar.

sef_heavygunner.name: SEF Heavy Gunner
sef_heavygunner.desc: An armored powerhouse, equipped with heavy weapons for sustained firepower. Slow to move, but devastating once in position.

sef_basic.name: SEF Grunt
sef_basic.desc: A newly deployed Space Expeditionary Force recruit. Lacks specialized gear but ready to follow orders and fight for the Corps.
